basic-nodejs-desc: Node.js installation, basic commands, REPL usage, version management.
modules-packages-desc: Using require, module.exports, creating custom modules, npm usage.
package-management-desc: Using npm and yarn, creating package.json, dependency management.
http-server-desc: Creating HTTP server, handling requests/responses, basic routing.
async-desc: Callbacks, Promises, async/await, handling asynchronous operations.
file-handling-desc: Using fs module, file operations, streams, I/O error handling.
expressjs-desc: Creating web applications with Express.js, middleware, routing.
databases-desc: Working with MongoDB (Mongoose), MySQL, PostgreSQL, CRUD operations.
debugging-desc: Using debugging tools like console.log, debugger, IDE tools.
event-loop-desc: Understanding Event Loop mechanism, handling events and asynchronicity.
testing-desc: Writing unit tests using Mocha, Chai, Jest, code coverage.
security-desc: Secure coding practices, data handling, vulnerability prevention.
deployment-desc: Deploying Node.js applications to servers, using Heroku, AWS, Docker.
clustering-desc: Using cluster module, scaling Node.js applications across multiple cores.
